00030     G4bool ScoringPlaneSD::ProcessHits(G4Step* step, G4TouchableHistory* history) {
00031 
00032         // Get the edep from the step.
00033         G4double edep = step->GetTotalEnergyDeposit();
00034         
00035         // Create a new hit object.
00036         G4TrackerHit* hit = new G4TrackerHit();
00037 
00038         // Assign track ID for finding the SimParticle in post event processing.
00039         hit->setTrackID(step->GetTrack()->GetTrackID());
00040 
00041         // Set the edep.
00042         hit->setEdep(edep);
00043 
00044         // Set the start position.
00045         G4StepPoint* prePoint = step->GetPreStepPoint();
00046 
00047         // Set the end position.
00048         G4StepPoint* postPoint = step->GetPostStepPoint();
00049 
00050         G4ThreeVector start = prePoint->GetPosition();
00051         G4ThreeVector end = postPoint->GetPosition();
00052 
00053         // Set the mid position.
00054         G4ThreeVector mid = 0.5 * (start + end);
00055         hit->setPosition(mid.x(), mid.y(), mid.z());
00056 
00057         // Compute path length.
00058         G4double pathLength = sqrt(pow(start.x() - end.x(), 2) 
00059                                 + pow(start.y() - end.y(), 2) 
00060                                 + pow(start.z() - end.z(), 2));
00061         hit->setPathLength(pathLength);
00062 
00063         // Set the global time.
00064         hit->setTime(step->GetTrack()->GetGlobalTime());
00065 
00066         // Set the momentum
00067         G4ThreeVector p = postPoint->GetMomentum();
00068         hit->setMomentum(p.x(), p.y(), p.z());
00069 
00070         
00071         /*
00072          * Set the 32-bit ID on the hit.
00073          */
00074         int cpNumber = prePoint->GetTouchableHandle()->GetCopyNumber();
00075         detID_->setFieldValue(1, cpNumber);
00076         hit->setID(detID_->pack());
00077         hit->setLayerID(cpNumber);
00078 
00079         /*
00080          * Debug print.
00081          */
00082         if (this->verboseLevel > 2) {
00083             hit->Print();
00084             std::cout << std::endl;
00085         }
00086 
00087         // Insert hit into current hits collection.
00088         hitsCollection_->insert(hit);
00089 
00090         return true;
